projects.title: Great Western Railway & Southwestern Railways
projects.bodyText:
- Implemented REST API integrations and backend models in .NET C# for a railway support system used by 5 UK train operators.
- Reduced deployment errors by 25% and enabled smooth data exchange.

projects.title: Altudo Marketing Website
projects.bodyText:
- Built a Sitecore 10.2 website with React and .NET, cutting load time by 30%.
- Increased visitor session duration by 18% with accessibility improvements.

projects.title: Campus Recruitment Management Platform
projects.bodyText:
- Role‑based dashboards for students, recruiters, and admins in Angular + Java.
- MySQL with 15+ tables, procedures, and triggers for robust data logic.

projects.title: C++ Search Engine Implementation
projects.bodyText:
- Inverted indexing with TF‑IDF scoring and OOP design.
- Achieved O(log n) query performance with real‑time normalization and snippets.
